body: Hey thanks! I've been feeling like a change would be nice for a while now and this picture seemed like it would do nicely.

Wow this is actually pretty dam poggers. Is it just me or are ugly bastard's the true alpha males instead of the more traditional Chad type person? Like I'd rather fight a chad than an ugly bastard, Like I see so many big ol ugly bastards irl and they're intimidating af it's like every last one of them is some 40 yo 130kg lump gristle of a man with more hair than a wild boar who's worked on a construction sight or fishing boat or as a butcher since he was like 14 and they're always muscled like a fucking chimpanzee and covered in a thick layer of protecting fat, like what can you even do to someone like that? Fuckers look like they could slap the head off a bear and you know most of them have been in like 100 pub scraps but normal young city Chad's are all full of shit point a knife at one and they're pissing themselves lol.
Nice, finally a story where the villains got their comeuppance. Not all heroes wear capes.
Welcome to fiction, phoenixdaddy...where the author is god and makes the rules you have to live by when reading.

so many idiots on the comment section... if they have as son, that guy will fuck them in the arse! And then cut their testes and penis, dress them like little girl and told that little cunt to walk all over the town with a sign board hanging on the neck written ; I'm a little boy without penis & testes, please rape me in the arse!

"so what if the kids that bullied him had sons instead" - Well, this is a hentai doujin. So, following hentai logic, he thought of this before hand and actually studied biological and genetic engineering and became a scientist in the 20 years after his bullying - with the sole purpose of inventing a method to completely and irreversibly change the biological sex of all boys to female just so he could thoroughly and completely rape the offspring of his revenge targets.
